Package edu.ntnu.idatt1002.k2_2.mitodo.view

Class PrimaryView

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.k2_2.mitodo.view.Component
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.k2_2.mitodo.view.View
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.k2_2.mitodo.view.PrimaryView
public class PrimaryView
extends View
The PrimaryView contains the main menu and the content. The main menu can be updated and the content can be changed.
Version:
1.0.0
